About us

Please feel free to choose from any of the below options and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Commodity Price Coin or CPC is a cryptocurrency or crypto-commodity market where coins are pegged to world commodity

Our vision at Commodity Price Coin is to build a global peer to peer based digital commodity market that will help provide a freer, fairer and more accessible system, in order to store and conditions.

2016

Commodity Price Coin was created in 2016 through capital raised by a New Zealand based and registered company â€“ Crycom
